original_text: But Judas Iscariot, one of his disciples (he who was about to betray him), said,
korean_text: 제자 중 하나로서 예수를 잡아 줄 가룟 유다가 말하되

sentences.original_text: But Judas Iscariot, one of his disciples,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 제자 중 하나인 가룟 유다는,

sentences.original_text: (he who was about to betray him),
